landing.hint1: You can choose from most of the transport type in Hong Kong. Enter the route number or destination name to search your route.
landing.hint2: Quick access to route keyboard is also avaliable.
landing.hint3: Information including the route timetable, arrival time and map is avaliable
landing.hint4: Mark your route with star and the route will be stored and viewed.
landing.hint5: Everything will be avaliable after the app finish downloading
landing.autoStart: Automatically start app after finish downloading
landing.nullUrl: The URL is empty, default api endpoint will be used.

searchView.title: {transportType} Routes
searchView.searchPlaceHolder: Please enter route No. or destination
searchView.noItemHint: Starred items will be displayed here

option.title: Options
option.removeAllStarPrompt:
This will clear all stars from route.
 Do you want to proceed?
option.resetAllPrompt:
All route data will be reloaded and all stars will be cleared.
 Do you want to proceed?
option.supportDescription: Show your support by buying me a cone
option.promiseDescription: The purpose of this app is to provide an ad-less and private alternative for viewing tranpsort in Hong Kong. This app do not and will not implement any ads and invasive trackers. All the data will be saved on the user's device and will never be uploaded to the server.
option.selectItemStyle: Select style of search result items
option.itemStyleCompactLeft: Compact - with badges on the left
option.itemStyleCompactRight: Compact - with badges on the right

toast.noEta: This route does not provide ETA service
toast.resetAll: All settins are reseted, the page will reload in 3 seconds
toast.networkError: Network error. Please check the source api and your network
toast.changeSourceHint: Please press Manage Data > Reload all routes data to apply chanegs
toast.invalidUrl: The Url is invalid. Please remember to include http:// or https://
toast.locationFail: Unable to get current location by gps.
toast.mapError: Some location cannot be shown on map. Please update the route data and try again.
